text: 6.20: 2 Ko 5.20; Fi 1.20; Fm 1.9-10Fhe Bakɨme nduara na sarigim, gu mba buna vhuueŋ bun suan zav vugi. Gu mba buna nɨɨeŋra nzuav gu bɨnan ki. Gu Fhe Bakɨmen buna vhuueŋ bun suanga ŋaar ki. Maaŋ muuŋgip, nde Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨp suaŋrim, ana na havhargirim, gu rɨvɨ thav, khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip, gumgi gu mbigi phorgɨp suanga.
